link.title: Robot Modeling with URDF
link.description: Create digital representations of robots using URDF (Unified Robot Description Format). Define links, joints, sensors, and collision geometry.

learningObjectives: Understand URDF syntax for robot description
Define robot links with visual and collision geometry
Create joints with proper kinematics and limits
Add sensors (cameras, LiDAR, IMU) to URDF models
Validate and visualize URDF in RViz2
